column5: I found a little river, with some beautiful scenery and lots of smallies. And I mean lots. I caught loads of em, most of them weighing just under a pound. But there were some nicer ones in the mix.
Nice dark fish and beautiful water! Thanks for sharing.

Awesome it sure reminds me of trips dad and I would take stopping any place we wanted to a d pounding the smallies. Thanks for bring that kick ass memory back for me it's been a long time since we fished water like that.

have to agree those days driving the back roads hunting for some new fishing spots with my dad are killer memeories never forgotten and the stories told over and over again tight lines in the sky pops
